name: Deja-Killed
description: Zako, the main charachter is a pro assassin.  After years of killing he start to feel like he is stuck in endless Deja-vu loop. For him every kill is the same, no matter what type of target he is after. All of them are the same.  For him time move only when he want to kill, he feel nothing, he hear nothing.  Experience the endless suffering of Zako.
